title: The Place Across the River
creator_credit: David Greig, John Richardson and Kestrel Film Productions
brief_description: Explore the rich history of Melbourne through the National Gallery of Victoria site in St Kilda Road, Melbourne, via its various uses, as a circus site in 1887 to the landmark cultural centre it became. Mixes found footage, stills and contemporary footage.
creator_credit_for_label: David Greig, John Richardson and Kestrel Film Productions
